resources.string: Please allow read permission to open model files.

This app allows you to view 3D models that you have downloaded, or open 3D models directly from your browser. Supports STL, OBJ, and PLY models. Tap the VR button at the bottom to view the model in your VR headset!\n\nCopyright © 2017–2020 Dmitry Brant.
Click this button to select a new image, and localize the position where this image is captured by SIFT feature matching
Click this button to preview the 3D point cloud reconstructed by Structure-from-Motion
Tell the server to start the SfM 3D recons with uploaded images
Download the reconstructed 3D point cloud from server (as .ply file)
